title: Why does rework Aatrox lack more detail then pre-rework + voice
body:
His body looks so plain and flat now, I know it's PBE so here's some contructive critism:

Add some black/dark red to his torso, like his current model. 
Relax on the processing/effects on Voice over, it sounds too pitchy like high pitch Project Jhin. Make it more lower and with more bass 

Other than that i think he looks really good ability wise.

I kinda like it. I have not always been a very big fan of complicated/unnecessary accessories (especially on champs who want to inspire fear, awe, or strength). It ended up making the character more focused on the fashion rather than the rawness of power. Personally, for Aatrox, even though I have never played him or took interest in him as a character, he benefit more this way. In his case, I think less is more.
